name: MobiCommerce
description:
MobiCommerce is the trusted ecommerce website and mobile app solution for B2C and B2B businesses as well as multi-vendor marketplaces. Growth-minded entrepreneurs around the world increase sales to online and mobile customers using the fully-tested, feature-rich, reliable, and affordable solutions from Mobicommerce.
MobiCommerce’s ready-made, mobile-enabled solutions for multiple industries enable entrepreneurs to get the ecommerce sites and mobile apps up and running with a handful of clicks and within a day or two. In addition, the solutions are scalable and customizable to fit each business’ unique needs. Ultimately, MobiCommerce’s customers save money and time building their ecommerce website and apps, increase sales and ROI, and have complete control over their brands and growth.
With a relentless focus on quality, security, and customer service, it leverages its deep experience and knowledge to support clients in a wide variety of industries operating in both the B2C and B2B channels, including retailers, delivery companies, pharmacies, groceries, online marketplaces, online pharmacies, spas, salons, laundry services, home décor, automotive, services providers and more.
B2C ECOMMERCE: Launch your brand online with an SEO-optimized responsive ecommerce website, full-featured Android and iOS ecommerce mobile apps, and a progressive web app.
B2B ECOMMERCE: Get the most robust online and mobile storefronts and a powerful admin panel on the back-end that gives you complete control at all times.
MULTI-VENDOR MARKETPLACE: Sell products and services from multiple vendors directly to consumers or businesses.
Schedule a free demo - https://bit.ly/2Gqx5Cb
READ MORE...

locations.address: 603/604, Parshwanath ESquare Corporate Road, Near Prahalad Nagar Garden, Satellite
